channel.title: Download Link Leads to a Phishing URL?
channel.description: I haven't seen any topic like this on the forum (if there is please provide a link). I apologize in advance if a topic like this already exists. So far all my attempts to download the game from the link provided by the website are unsuccessful. My antivirus, Kaspersky, labels the download as a phishing url. Has this happened with anyone else with the same or different antivirus? Is there a way around this without disabling Kaspersky? Any and all help is appreciated.

item.title: Download Link Leads to a Phishing URL?
item.dc:creator: fishout_awatah
item.description:
Geez, I knew I was being an idiot . The first thing I would click on was a green download button. Thanks for the help guy’s.

Read full topic

item.title: Download Link Leads to a Phishing URL?
item.dc:creator: Cheerios
item.description:
are you clicking on one of the many mirrors that show up on the download page, or are you clicking on an advertisement?

No matter. Go here and follow the instructions. In point 4 follow the part that directs you to gamefront. https://wiki.blackmesasource.com/Installation_Manual#Installation_Instructions_.28step_by_step.29
